skin:
############################################################################### # change flags description (for converting skin to another screen resolution) # # # # stop converting # # # # begin converting # # # # rename next screen and stop converting # # example1: if name ends with 'xxx#_FHDscreen', renamed to 'xxx' # # example2: if name ends with 'xxx', renamed to 'xxx#_HDscreen' # # example3: if name ends with 'xxx#_UHDscreen', renamed to 'xxx' # # example4: if name ends with 'xxx', renamed to 'xxx#_HDscreen' # # # # next line is a picon position # #(for centered position at different picon size -> xpicon scalable option) # # # # next line is a pixmap png file and not change path or check this # ###############################################################################
{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 8), size = (465, 50), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0) ], "fonts": [gFont("global_menu", 30)], "itemHeight": 60 }
FLASHfree
{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (10, 10), size = (54, 54), png = 3), # index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (71, 46), size = (15, 16), png = 4), # index 4 is the default pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (600, 40), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), # index 1 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 42), size = (600, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD",28),gFont("SetrixHD",20)], "itemHeight": 75 }
{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (650, 40), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the essid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 42), size = (210, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is the interface MultiContentEntryText(pos = (230, 42), size = (210, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 0 is the encryption MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 8), size = (220, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 0 is the signal MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 42), size = (220, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 0 is the maxrate ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD",28),gFont("SetrixHD",20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"templates": {"default": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45, 0), size = (65, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (130, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 0), size = (300, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (640, 4), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45, 0), size = (65, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (130, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 0), size = (300, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (640, 4), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20), gFont("Regular",16)], "itemHeight": 30 }
